title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: The story of the fabulously wealthy Jay Gatsby and his love for the beautiful Daisy Buchanan.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A novel that explores the irrationality of adult attitudes toward race and class in the Deep South of the 1930s.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society, where the government surveils and controls the thoughts and actions of its citizens.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A classic romance novel featuring the independent and spirited Elizabeth Bennet and the proud Mr. Darcy.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: A novel narrated by Holden Caulfield, a disaffected teenager, as he wanders through New York City after being expelled from prep school.
